en.hotlinkDesc: Enable the accessibility of those hotlinking images
en.customDesc: Custom where your urls are going
en.blockDesc: Block website that U don't like
en.hstsDesc: Force HTTPS connection to some website
en.corsDesc: Allow you to request any site with ajax from any origin
en.logDesc: Help U inspecting the webrequests
en.addARule2Enable: add a rule to enble this feature
en.needARuleEnable: enable a rule to enble this feature

zh-cn.hotlinkDesc: 帮你轻松的访问盗链图
zh-cn.customDesc: 自定义你的链接跳往何处
zh-cn.hstsDesc: 强制使用HTTPS来打开某些网站
zh-cn.referDesc: 帮助你浏览有盗链防护的图片
zh-cn.corsDesc: 允许你从任意站点向任意网站发起跨域情况
zh-cn.logDesc: 审查网络请求
zh-cn.addARule2Enable: 添加一条规则后才能开启该功能
zh-cn.needARuleEnable: 启用一条规则后才能开启该功能
